com.aionemu.commons.scripting.metadata
Annotation Type OnClassLoad

@Documented
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OnClassLoad

Method marked as OnClassLoad will be called when class was loaded by script.
It's more useful alternative for 

 static {
        ...
 }
block.

Only static methods with no arguments can be marked with this annotation.
This is only used if ScriptContext.getClassListener() returns instance of DefaultClassListener subclass.

Author:
SoulKeeper
